message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Given its exceptional value and quality, I believe it would be a great asset for you. Considering its worth to us and your potential benefit, I propose a price of $1,300,000 for the product. This offer aims to provide a fair balance between maximizing my earnings and ensuring you receive a valuable addition to your collection or business. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value of your product, $1,300,000 is a bit higher than my budget allows.  I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for it.  This price would still allow you to make a profit and would be a good deal for me.  What do you think?
